description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows Installer (CVE-2024-38014), apply the relevant updates provided below:

1. Identify your Windows version and architecture (x64-based or 32-bit).
2. Download and install the appropriate KB update from the links provided.
3. Restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the improper privilege management issue present in the Windows Installer.
- Ensure your system is running the specified build numbers to avoid compatibility issues.

**Update Packages**:
- For Windows 11 Version 24H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5043080](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043080)
- For Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5043076](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043076)
- For Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5043076](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043076)
- For Windows 11 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5043067](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043067)
- For Windows 10 (x64 and 32-bit): [KB5043083](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043083)
- For Windows 10 Version 22H2 and 21H2 for x64 and 32-bit Systems: [KB5043064](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043064).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is updated to the appropriate build as specified.
- Backup critical data before proceeding.
